Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~davidkel ~andrew-coleman Is there somebody from your team that could work on this? Same issue exists on node chaincode. Until there is versioned docs, in the short term for v1.3 perhaps we just need to be very clear in the docs about which releases functions got introduced in.

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Triage comment Sept 10: This issue is being worked. This not a code issue, it is a build process issue.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: This is waiting on a fix from ~mbwhite who is addressing a very similar problem in the chaincode-node reference documentation. Once this fix is available it will be ported to the node-sdk

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~davidkel what's the plan for this one, now that the chaincode-node CR was merged?

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: Will start working on this again - as soon as the Chaincode repo is sorted - will move onto the SDK

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: We can do this without that change; but would make it so much easier!
